author: wrowe
msg: Decry the horrible state the completion of ap_proc_t has left some
platforms in... since pid is a process id (valid across all processes)
but the handle we stuff in this field is invalid outside the process
Oh, and cast the cr*p to dump the compiler warning.

author: rbb
msg: Change the APR configure process to call MM's configure script early
instead of at the end of the script.  With this change, APR can determine
if shared memory is provided using a file that multiple platforms can open,
or if it is acheived using some sort of shared memory (including MMAP'ed
files).  This information is used in Apache to provide some optimizations.

author: trawick
msg: make help text for a couple of APR configure options more neat/correct

author: trawick
msg: Get FreeBSD building again with the resource limiting changes (FreeBSD
rlim_t is defined in <sys/types.h>, so we usually need that.
Some stuff in <sys/resource.h> needs <sys/time.h> for timeval just to

author: dgaudet
msg: - don't call fcntl more than once for the socket
- accepted socket timeouts start at -1 just like sockets created by other
